concept.title: Classes and Methods
concept.shortdesc: Language bindings for Livefyreâ€™s server-side library methods.

conbody.p: The following classes of methods exist in order to interface to interact with Livefyre:

ul.li: . Interface to interact with Livefyre network-level API.
Collection Class. Interface to interact with Livefyre Collection-level API.
Site Class. Interface to interact with Livefyre site-level API.
